title: Teacher Cai is a Bit Sweet - Novel Updates
author: 晏十日
description:
On Chinese New Year’s Eve, Lu Feng announced: I can’t get it up anymore.

Teacher Cai: My chance has come.

Toward this shou who was bouncing at the thought of counterattacking, the gong thought, “The fact that you still have the strength to crawl out of the bed is my loss.”>
